name: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
title: The spice must flow
description: A science fiction masterpiece about politics, religion, and ecology on the desert planet Arrakis.

name: Foundation
author: Isaac Asimov
title: The saga of galactic empire
description: The first book in the Foundation series about the fall and rise of a galactic civilization.

name: Neuromancer
author: William Gibson
title: The cyberpunk classic
description: A groundbreaking cyberpunk novel about a washed-up computer hacker hired for one last job.

name: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
title: Don't panic!
description: A comedic science fiction series following the misadventures of Arthur Dent after Earth's destruction.

name: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
title: The enemy's gate is down
description: A military science fiction novel about a young boy trained to lead humanity in war against an alien race.

name: The Three-Body Problem
author: Liu Cixin
title: First contact with an alien civilization
description: A hard science fiction novel exploring humanity's first contact with an alien civilization.
